sourcesContent:
import { AbstractControl, FormBuilder, ValidationErrors, ValidatorFn, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { ProfileDetails } from './../../../types/profile-details'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { emailValidator } from '../../shared/utils/email-validator'; import { EMAIL_DOMAINS } from 'src/app/constants'; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile', templateUrl: './profile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile.component.css'] }) export class ProfileComponent { showEditMode: boolean = false; profileDetails: ProfileDetails = { username: 'John', email: 'johny@gmail.com', tel: '088' }; form = this.formBuilder.group({ username: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(5)]], email: ['', [Validators.required, emailValidator(EMAIL_DOMAINS)]], tel: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.pattern('^[0-9]+$'), this.exactLengthValidator(9)]] }) constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder) {} saveProfileHandle(): void { console.log('invoked', this.form.value); if(this.form.invalid) { return; } this.profileDetails = this.form.value as ProfileDetails; this.onToggle() } onToggle(): void { this.showEditMode = !this.showEditMode; } exactLengthValidator(requiredLength: number) : ValidatorFn { return (control: AbstractControl): ValidationErrors | null => { const isValid = control.value?.length === requiredLength; return isValid ? null : { exactLength: requiredLength } } } }

User Info:

Username:

{{this.profileDetails.username}}

Email:

{{this.profileDetails.email}}

Phone:

{{this.profileDetails.tel}}

Username:

The username is required

The Username length must me at least {{this.form.get('username')?.errors?.['minlength'].requiredLength}}

Email:

The email is required

The email length must me at least {{this.form.get('username')?.errors?.['minlength'].requiredLength}}

Phone:

The phone number is required

The phone number must contain only digits

The phone number must be comprised of {{form.get('tel')?.errors?.['exactLength'].requiredLength} characters
